pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, December 1, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation and discuss the Fall Economic Statement. A media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 11:00 a.m. and to make their way to the P1 Gate once on the grounds.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Media appearances

7:25 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on 98.5 FM Montréal.

8:30 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on CBC Radio One’s The Current.
